long_desc: Puff the Fractal Dragon is here, contemplating a higher reality.

detail_desc:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard. He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.
long_desc: A Wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.

detail_desc:
A fat, nice looking baker. But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.
long_desc: The Baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.

detail_desc: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.
long_desc: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.

detail_desc: A young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn.
long_desc: A weaponsmith.

detail_desc:
An old but very strong armourer, he has made more armours in his
lifetime than you have ever seen.
long_desc: An Armourer stands here.

detail_desc: You notice a tired look in her face.
long_desc:
A receptionist stands in front of you, looking at you like you were the
center of the universe.

detail_desc: This Captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.
long_desc: A retired Captain stands here, selling boats.

detail_desc: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.
long_desc: A Sailor stands here, waiting to help you.

detail_desc: He is young and close-cropped and looks quite happy.
long_desc: A Pet Shop Boy is here, humming gently.

detail_desc: He is fat and has a content although watchful look on his face.
long_desc: The Jeweller is standing behind the desk.

detail_desc:
He looks as an honest, hard-working artisan who only just earns enough to
keep himself going.
long_desc: The Leather Worker is sitting by the table, sewing a leather cap.

detail_desc:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she posesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here.

detail_desc:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your god; he has
a peaceful, loving look. You notice that he is surrounded by a white aura.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here.

detail_desc:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief. She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here.

detail_desc:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.
long_desc: Your guildmaster is standing here.

detail_desc:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.
long_desc: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the Faith.
His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel attacks and
his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes him a deadly
opponent.
long_desc: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as possible,
using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how and where to use
them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes him a deadly opponent.
long_desc: An assassin is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.
long_desc: A knight is guarding the entrance.

detail_desc: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.
long_desc: A Bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.

detail_desc: A tired looking waiter.
long_desc: A waiter is going around from one place to another.

A man who in his young days was a famous sorcerer but now leads a quiet,
peaceful life as a waiter.
A waiter who seems to have reach contact with God.
A waiter who knows where all his costumers has their money.
A waiter who easily could kill you, and still carry quite a few firebreathers.

detail_desc:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty. He likes to keep his costumers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.
long_desc: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.

detail_desc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
long_desc: A cityguard stands here.
A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.

detail_desc:
Fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat hanging
around his teeth.
long_desc: Beastly Fido is here.

detail_desc: He looks pretty mean.
long_desc: A Mercenary waiting for a job.

detail_desc: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.
long_desc: A singing, happy Drunk.

detail_desc: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.
long_desc: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.

detail_desc: Odif is a small dog that has been reversed by some god.
long_desc: Odif Yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.

detail_desc: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
long_desc: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.

detail_desc: The Kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
long_desc: A small loyal Kitten is here.

detail_desc: The Puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
long_desc: A small loyal Puppy is here.

detail_desc: The Beagle looks like a fierce fighter.
long_desc: A small, quick, loyal Beagle is here.

detail_desc: The Rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.
long_desc: A large, loyal Rottweiler is here.

detail_desc: The Wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.
long_desc: A large, trained Wolf is here.

detail_desc:
She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes. A good reason
for coming here more often.
long_desc: The Maid is waiting for your order.

detail_desc: The Sexton looks like he is relaxing after another gravedigging job.
long_desc: A Sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.

detail_desc: The white swan is very elegant.
long_desc: A swan is swimming around in the pond.

detail_desc: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.
long_desc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.

detail_desc: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.
long_desc: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.

detail_desc: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.
long_desc: A duck is here, quacking happily.

detail_desc: The very angry Captain of the Guard.
long_desc: The Captain of the Guard is looking very upset.

detail_desc: A big, strong, angry guard.
long_desc: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.

detail_desc:
She looks very busy.

>
The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today.'
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime.'
long_desc: A secretary is sitting at the desk, typing away on the typewriter.

detail_desc: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.
long_desc: The Mayor is sitting in his huge chair, snoring loudly.

detail_desc: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.
long_desc: The Town Crier is here, weeping quietly.

detail_desc:
This is just about the most huggable cat you have ever seen! You notice
that the cat has exceptionally big claws - guess it's nothing to worry
about as long as you leave it alone.
long_desc: Papi's favorite cat is resting here, purring gently.

detail_desc:
He is a tall but bulky man in his late fifties.  His features are worn with
decades of hard work and his somewhat crouched expression is one of deep
sorrow and depression.  He is haunted by a memory of a lost paradise.
long_desc: Henry the Gardener is sitting here, looking drunk.

detail_desc: Maggots crawl all over its decaying body.
long_desc: A rotting corpse is staggering towards you with outstretched hands.

detail_desc:
It is a walking corpse with long fangs and long, sharp nails that most of
resemble claws.  Its eyes are a dark yellow colour and glare hungrily at you.
long_desc: A ghastly ghoul is here.

detail_desc: It looks hungry.
long_desc: A large dreadful snake.

detail_desc: It looks harmless.
long_desc: A small green snake.

detail_desc: It looks complete harmless.
long_desc: A small centipede.

detail_desc: It looks ugly.
long_desc: A ugly kobold.

detail_desc: You notice an evil look in his eyes
long_desc: The orc walks around, looking for someone to kill.

detail_desc: He looks dreadful.
long_desc: A large orc, really mean.

detail_desc: Well surely a strong, brainless fighter.
long_desc:
A tall dangerous warrior. He has more scares than anyone you have
seen before.

detail_desc: He seems to know his way with weapons.
long_desc: A tall warrior.

detail_desc: The hobgoblin looks quite lost.
long_desc: A small hobgoblin stands here.

detail_desc: The snake looks quite mean.
long_desc: A brown snake watches you.

detail_desc: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.
long_desc: A white centipede is here.

detail_desc: The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous.
long_desc: A large hobgoblin is here.

detail_desc: Well he doesn't seem to be friendly.
long_desc: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone ? ) to eat.

detail_desc: His IQ makes almost any dikumud player look stupid..
long_desc:
A small intelligent looking mage is standing here. It looks like he
knows his way with the magic.

detail_desc: Well looks dangerous.!
long_desc: A large mean-looking troll is here.

detail_desc: You see a evil creature.
long_desc: A large green snake, looks like a guardian for an evil force.

detail_desc: Well COUNT you money..!
long_desc: A thief, all dressed in black.

detail_desc: Yrkk..
long_desc: A ugly orc is standing here.

detail_desc: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention towards you.
long_desc: A small harmless centipede is here.

detail_desc: He doesn't look friendly at all...
long_desc: A human warrior is here. He has a evil grin in his face.

detail_desc: It looks slimy..
long_desc: A green kobold is here.

detail_desc: It looks electric.
long_desc: A blue bat is here.

detail_desc: It looks warm.
long_desc: A red bat is here.

detail_desc: It looks poisonous.
long_desc: A green bat is here.

detail_desc: It looks cold.
long_desc: A white bat is here.

detail_desc: It looks corrosive.
long_desc: A black bat is here.

detail_desc: He looks quite professional.
long_desc: A sneaky thief is here.

detail_desc: He looks quite mean.
long_desc: A large ugle troll is here.

detail_desc: He is reading in his magic books.
long_desc: A small mage is here.

detail_desc: It looks angry.
long_desc: A brown snake is here.

detail_desc: He looks like a normal troll, the standard mud troll..
long_desc: A small troll is here.

detail_desc: He looke quite aggressive.
long_desc: A large orc is here.

detail_desc:
Aruncus is a tall, skinny druid with a face marked by nature.
He seems to be in peace with himself and his surroundings.
long_desc: Aruncus the Druid is walking around here, searching for herbs.

detail_desc:
Sorbus bares the marks of a long, hard life in solitude.
He is dressed in simple clothing and looks like he has little
or nothing to say.
long_desc: Sorbus the Hermit is sitting here, roasting a rabbit.

detail_desc:
The street merchant looks like he knows his way about.
His face is scarred from numerous attacks, which he so far obviously
has won.
long_desc: A street merchant is here, selling out from his extensive inventory.

detail_desc:
He looks the average citizen of Ofcol.
Basically he seems like a nice person with no interrest in harming
you or others.
He wears normal, light clothing and has an anonymous face.
long_desc: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you.. stranger!

detail_desc:
She looks the average citizen of Ofcol.
Basically she seems like a nice person with no interrest in harming
you or others.
She wears a minimum of clothing and has big....eyes.
long_desc: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you.. stranger!

detail_desc:
Shudde-M'ell is about 15 ft long and is surrounded by an evil stench,
The worm is the protector of the treasure of G'harne and has been so
for as long anyone can remember.
long_desc: Shudde-M'ell the Giant worm of G'harne is guarding his treasure.

detail_desc:
Luxan is dressed in a strange jacket.
He looks like a mean trader from the outskirts of Midgaard.
His life is seems to be totally occupied with trading.
He looks very fit and capable of protecting his goods.
long_desc: Luxan the Shopkeeper is here, eager to sell you anything.

detail_desc:
As you study Matty you notice that she has exactly the same taste
in clothing as you.
long_desc:
Matty the daughter of Luxan is here, looking after the stored items.
Matty is eager to serve you.

detail_desc:
The Innkeeper looks skilled in brewing different beers and mixing the
weirdest drinks known. He also looks very big.
long_desc: An Innkeeper is here waiting for your order.

detail_desc:
Ravan's pet dragon is about 3 ft. tall with small pointy teeth.
The small wings are eagerly trying to lift her from the ground,
but so far they haven't succeeded.
long_desc: Ravan's pet dragon is bouncing around here flapping her cute wings.

detail_desc:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.
long_desc: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.

detail_desc: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.
long_desc: A cute rabbit is here.

detail_desc:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.
long_desc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.

detail_desc:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by
the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent
rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.
long_desc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.

detail_desc:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.
long_desc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.

detail_desc: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.
long_desc: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.

detail_desc:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
long_desc: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.

detail_desc:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
long_desc: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.

detail_desc: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
long_desc: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.

detail_desc: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
long_desc: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.

detail_desc:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.

>
The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.
long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
short_desc: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,

detail_desc:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.

>
The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.
long_desc: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
short_desc: a huge, ancient tree, walking on giant roots,

detail_desc:
This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does
the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only dragons
do.
long_desc: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.

detail_desc:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It
has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface and
sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.
long_desc: A huge, poisonous spider is here.

detail_desc:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight
huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.
long_desc: The huge, bulky Queen Spider is here.

detail_desc:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long
tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if
he is having great fun.
long_desc: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.

detail_desc:
It is one of those irritating little creatures that like to infect innocent
and defenceless programs, trying to make them act weird.  Programmers spend
countless hours trying to eliminate them, but they are indeed very hardy.
DikuMUD is known to be one of their favourite habitats.
long_desc: A little, hairy computer bug is here, trying to mess things up.

detail_desc:
She is no less than beautiful, skin as dark as the night and hair shining like
silver in the moonlight.  Her slender body is adorned with a sleeveless shirt
and a short skirt made from black scales joined with silver threads.  Her back
is covered by a large, hooded cloak as black as her skin and in her broad
silver belt hangs a long, slender sword in a silver scabbard.
long_desc: Isha the Dark Elf is here, observing you silently.

detail_desc:
It sure looks like something out of a horrormovie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner
- Perhaps you?
long_desc: A horrifying Mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...

detail_desc:
You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature,
though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there, sleeping. The thought of 
arousing this cruel creature doesn't seem appealing.
long_desc: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling, obviously sleeping.
The Huge Hungry-looking Sewer Rat sits here
The small hairy Spider
The Giant Mean-looking Earth Beetle
The Giant Maggot
The snake slithers towards you

detail_desc: The evil wanderer is very thin. He is dressed in a grey cloak.
long_desc: The evil wanderer stares at you

detail_desc:
The Homonculus appears in a man-like form, about 18'' tall, it has a
greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a batlike mouth, with
teeth gleaming yellow.
long_desc: The creature homonculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.

detail_desc:
The Knight is standing here, smiling at you. He is dressed all in
white, blue and silver. He looks VERY strong, as he stands here, ready to
help the innocent.
long_desc: The Grand Knight is standing here, waiting for someone to help.

detail_desc:
The head and torso of a chr-eff'n is copper-covered, with yellow
,glowing eyes. The lower body is in an orange shading.
long_desc: The chr-eff'n are crawling here, looking around with it's yellow eyes.

detail_desc:
It's a five feet tall, shadow monster. The shape of this creature lies
somewhere between a human and a rat. It breaths very heavily, while staring
at you with such a glint in the eyes that reminds you of immense hunger.
long_desc: The Morkoth is standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!

detail_desc:
She is very big standing here, smiling to you. She looks like the
mother of the town, sometimes playing with the children, sometimes 
helping the old people, with their daily work. All this in spite of
her own hard work.
long_desc: Madam Esther is standing here, trying to sell dust.

detail_desc:
It sure looks like something out of a horrormovie. It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner
- Perhaps you?
long_desc: A horrifying Mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud ...

detail_desc:
The red dragon stares at you, angrilly, as it wakes when you
arrives.  It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up...Hsssss', while
it moves closer ,'Can one NEVER sleep in peace..Hssss'.
long_desc: The Red fierce-looking dragon stares at you angrily

detail_desc:
The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you fell's the deepest
fear: Big yellow eyes and sharp teeths. Its ears are very big,
and it have small sharp horns. This type of monsters are one of
the greatest haters of beauty (Next after Medusa).
long_desc: The Sea Hag is swimming around here

detail_desc:
The naga are a snake-liked creature. She is covered in green-gold
scale with silvery triangles along her back. Her eyes are golden.
She notice that you look at her, and she says: 'Watch out. This way
leads to some evil creatures'.
long_desc: The Guardian Naga looks kindly at you.

detail_desc:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster. It has eight legs, and a strong
toothy jaws. It is dull brown with yellowish underbell. It's eyes are
glowing pale green.
long_desc: The scaled Basilisk crawls towards you slowly.

detail_desc:
This looks like a vaguely human blob. Big black yellow eyes, and a
mouth going a little bit out from the face. The lemure does not look
interested in you at all, but anyway it attackes. It looks like it's
mind has been burned out.
long_desc: The lemure blob slithers terribly precisely towards you for an attack!

detail_desc:
At the first sight you thought Jones was an Orc, but when it came
closer you saw his second head. He wears an animal skinn dress,
filthy and moth eaten. Jones really stinks...
long_desc: Jones is standing here glaring at you.

detail_desc:
When you look at Herald, you feel petty. His dress are really poor,
and the one of his heads hangs down. At the rope around his stomach
hangs dead mouses and rats. He does not smell good.
long_desc: Herald is standing here looking confused at you.

detail_desc:
It's a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now. In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.
long_desc: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.

detail_desc:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high. Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand. In the center of its head are four large
tentacles with very sharp points.
long_desc: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.

detail_desc:
This mindflayer is six foot high. It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth. It has four small tentacles in the 
center of its head.
long_desc: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.

detail_desc:
The wererat is about four foot tall. It looks very much like rat, exept
that it is standing.
long_desc: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.

detail_desc:
The gigantic rat is about ten foot long from head to tail and has claws
the size of your head looking very nasty.
long_desc: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.

detail_desc:
It is obviously a large creature, but an improbable number of sharp 
blades, claws and edges makes it near impossible to see its actual 
body. It is gleaming, a metallic black, although occasionally a claw or 
blade changes colour for a while, becoming a neon yellow.
long_desc: A Shredder advances towards you, claws clicking menacingly.

detail_desc:
It is a smallish creature, with too many legs to count, obviously 
very fast. It has a multicoloured carapace (looking much like an oil 
slick on a puddle), and bright red pinpoint eyes.
long_desc:
A bug scuttles towards you, running in small circles around your 
feet.

detail_desc:
It appears to be a vaguely man-shaped (but larger than man-sized!) hole 
in the fabric of reality... looking closely, you can see stars, either 
inside it, or far beyond it...
long_desc:
The Daemon looks at you expressionlessly, from the comfort of its
chair (it feels that way, anyway... You can't see its eyes). Then its
attention returns to the screens.

detail_desc:
It is a ball of pulsating colours, extruding and retracting sharp 
points continually, sometimes changing shape altogether into some 
regular solid like a cube or an octahedron.
long_desc: The Cursor is here, tracing incomprehensible patterns in the air.

detail_desc:
It is _very_ large, some 10 yds in length, walking on several hundred 
tiny legs. It is metallic-looking, with large spots of corrosion 
marring its angular skin. On its sides are large signs, written in an 
incomprehensible language. On its top, a small eye cluster swivels back 
and forth continually. A number of tentacles sweeps the ground around 
it.
long_desc: A Juggernaut a working its way methodically through this area.

detail_desc:
It is, on closer inspection, not really an animal, but a variable 
number of brightly-coloured, translucent planes of breathtaking beauty 
and delicacy. The planes pulse, waver, sometimes disappear, but are 
always replaced by another. None of the planes move, but through 
continuous replacement, the butterfly does, in random sweeps.
long_desc: A beautiful, butterfly-like thing is fluttering around here.

detail_desc:
He is dressed in jeans, boots, a hat that shades his face so that it
is hard to see, where he's looking. He is walking around purposefully,
as if searching for something, occasionally getting down to one knee,
making strange passes in the air, then picking up pieces of the ground 
that are apparently not so solid now. He is carrying a leather satchel 
over the shoulder, into which he sometimes place some of the pieces. At
his belt hangs a strange, bluish whip
When ne notices your intense scrutiny, he looks at you coldly, until you
are forced to look away.
long_desc: A hard-eyed cowboy is here, going about his business.

detail_desc:
He is a very old man, dressed in an old robe, but from the glint in his clear
blue eyes You can see that He is aware of the world, and Wise to its traps
and pitfalls.
long_desc: The old Hierophant of the holy grove is here, gathering hollies.
